test-set.name: math-asin
test-set.description: Tests for the math:asin function introduced in XPath 3.0

test-case.name: math-asin-001
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument ()

test-case.name: math-asin-002
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument 0

test-case.name: math-asin-003
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument -0.0e0

test-case.name: math-asin-004
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument math:pi() div 4

test-case.name: math-asin-005
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument -math:pi() div 4

test-case.name: math-asin-006
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument math:pi() div 2

test-case.name: math-asin-007
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument xs:double('NaN')

test-case.name: math-asin-08
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument xs:double('INF')

test-case.name: math-asin-09
test-case.description: Evaluate the function math:asin() with the argument xs:double('-INF')
